channel.title: Kothagudem on TechnoStreet
channel.description: Recent content in Kothagudem on TechnoStreet

item.title: Pressure mine planted by Maoists explodes, injures a cow in Kothagudem
item.description: Pressure mine planted by Maoists explodes, injures a cow in Kothagudem Cherla police, Kothagudem special party personnel and bomb disposal team found two more pressure mines at the incident site and defused them on the spot.

item.title: Kothagudem: CI extends financial support to ailing man
item.description: Kothagudem: CI extends financial support to ailing man Yellandu Inspector of Police, Banoth Raju extended financial assistance to an ailing private worker.
